profile.profileName: [Oorlog in Blik Project, Amsterdam, Holland] Film and sound database
profile.profileDescription: Use this profile if you want an object centered simple system that is based on Dublin Core

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of item description. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Caption
label.description: Short descriptive caption for item.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Notes (internal use only)
label.description: Notes regarding item

label.name: GeoNames
label.description: A Geographic lookup that takes search text, passes it to the GeoNames search service and provides a dropdown with search results (ordered by score). Selected geoname is stored as both text (name, country, continent and ID) and the service URL identifier.

label.name: Languages
label.description: The language of the resource.

label.name: Type
label.description: The nature or genre of the resource.

label.name: Maker
label.description: An entity primarily responsible for making the resource.

label.name: Maker
label.description: An entity primarily responsible for making the resource.

label.name: Keywords
label.description: Descriptive keywords about the resource.

label.name: Keywords
label.description: Descriptive keywords about the resource.

label.name: Dated
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the lifecycle of the resource.

label.name: Datering
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the lifecycle of the resource.

label.name: Locations
label.description: The spatial or temporal topic of the resource

label.name: Locaties
label.description: The spatial or temporal topic of the resource

label.name: Description
label.description: An account of the resource.

label.name: Beschrijving
label.description: An account of the resource.

label.name: Color
label.description: The file format

label.name: Kleur
label.description: The file format

label.name: Length
label.description: The file format

label.name: duur
label.description: The file format

label.name: Form
label.description: The file format

label.name: Vorm
label.description: The file format

label.name: Rights
label.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

label.name: Rechten
label.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

label.name: Sound
label.description: Select yes or no if there is for this resource.

label.name: Geluid
label.description: Select ja or nee if there is for this resource.

label.name: Institution
label.description: An entity responsible for making the resource available.

label.name: Instelling
label.description: An entity responsible for making the resource available.

label.name: Participant
label.description: An entity responsible for making contributions to the resource.

label.name: Commentaar
label.description: An entity responsible for making contributions to the resource.

label.name: Comments
label.description: Enter any addtional comments.

label.name: Deelnemer
label.description: Enter any addtional comments.

label.name: URL
label.description: URL of streaming media.

label.name: URL
label.description: URL of streaming media.

label.name: Description
label.description: Narrative biography for entity. This is the primary text used to document the entity.

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of entity biography. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Long introduction
label.description: Long narrative description for set. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the set.
